tweets.text:
Time and time again, the comments I see reflect impatience and a general lack of understanding for what is going on with the evolution of the digital asset space, particularly with projects like #XRP #HBAR #AXL #ALGO #XDC #XLM #DAG, etc

A lot of people fail to understand that
Imagine the fresh liquidity entering crypto over the next year via stablecoin growth

About 30% of multi-step crypto transactions have completion issues....a major problem for institutions that need things to work reliably. The #XRP Ledger’s XLS-56 update works to make transactions smarter, safer, and way more reliable.
1/20

For large institutions considering blockchain, this level of transactional certainty is non-negotiable. XLS-56 eliminates one of the biggest risks they face. 
19/20

More than just speed...crypto is about making transactions smarter, safer, and more reliable. XLS-56 is a major step in that direction. 
20/20

In some ecosystems, if one step fails, funds can get stuck in limbo. XLS-56 tackles this issue with a complete rethink of how complex transactions should work.
2/20
Small daily improvements are the key to staggering long-term results.

Are analysts are downplaying where XRP might actually be headed? You can look at charts, but that's a narrow lens and can miss the bigger picture. Zoom out and look at things like its real-world utility, growing traction with institutions, network strength, and even some

Breaking: If you're an island boy, listen up. A group of Democratic lawmakers just rolled out a new bill aimed at ending Puerto Rico’s status as a go-to tax shelter for crypto investors. 
1/13

One thing’s becoming pretty clear though: as crypto gets more mainstream, tax loopholes are starting to close. It's wise to plan ahead by setting things up to mitigate future taxes now in the event that some digital assets end up getting taxed just like everything else. 
12/13

This is a good reminder that nothing lasts forever. Tax policies change but the need for thoughtful planning remains, and that's why it's important to work with professionals.
13/13

We know that tokenization is creating massive investment potential, but you have to remember that only about ~7% of the world's population has any exposure to crypto. Markets with quadrillions of dollars in value are in motion, and the winners are being chosen now
Looking forward to another great event, see ya'll in Texas
